Users Guide for Hourglass Written by Kazeera Aliar 1 Preface This is the official guide for Hourglass, the software tool to systematically interrogate multiparametric datasets in a semi-automated manner. It allows users to filter/subset datasets and perform analysis at the global, regional and patient-paired levels to identify communalities and differences. Figure 1.1: The Hourglass logo. Hourglass exists as an open-source desktop application for Windows/MacOS and a stand-alone R package. Please refer to our link manuscript for more information.
